description.ar: قال الساحر العظيم ذات يوم وهو يلقي عملة ذهبية على الأب: “أريد أن آخذه بعيدًا”. ساحر اعتنى بي ومنحني كل ما أتمناه. كان سبب اصطحابي عندما كان ينظر إلى شخص ما
description.en:
An ordinary girl meets an extraordinary mage.

Asha lives a hard life with her alcoholic father. That is, until the day she meets a mysterious stranger who whisks her away and gives her everything she could ever want. Who is he? Why is he so kind? And why does he look at her as if he knows her? Asha wonders what secrets their past holds.
description.es: “Me llevaré a esa niña.” Un día, un mago de clase alta llegó y arrojó una bolsa de monedas de oro a su padre. Un mago que se preocupa por mí y me concede todo lo que deseo. La razón por la que me recogió fue porque le recordaba a alguien, solo pensé eso… “Al final de este largo, largo viaje, finalmente encontré lo más hermoso y preciado para mí.” Me miró de todo corazón y me sonrió.
description.ko: “저 아이를 데려가고 싶습니다.” 어느 날, 위대한 마법사가 찾아와 아버지에게 금화를 던지며 말했다. 나를 아껴주며 바라는 모든 것을 들어주던 마법사. 그가 나를 거둔 이유는 누군가를 겹쳐 보고 있기 때문이라고, 그렇다고만 생각했는데… “이 길고 긴 여행의 끝에 마침내 찾았어, 가장 아름다운 것을.” 그는 온전히 나를 바라보며 미소 지었다.
description.pt: Uma garota ordinária conhece um mago extraordinário. Asha vive uma vida dificil com seu pai alcoólatra. Isso é, até o dia que ela conhece um misterioso Mago que oferece dinheiro ao seu pai para leva-la embora, para assim dar tudo que a criança poderia desejar. Quem é ele? Por que ele é tão gentil? E por que ele olha para ela como se a conhecesse? Asha se pergunta quais segredos seu passado esconde.
description.tr: Sıradan bir kız, sıra dışı bir büyücüyle tanışır. Asha alkolik babasıyla zor bir hayat yaşamaktadır. Ta ki onu alıp götüren ve ona isteyebileceği her şeyi veren gizemli bir yabancıyla tanıştığı güne kadar. Kimdir bu adam? Neden bu kadar naziktir? Ve neden ona sanki onu tanıyormuş gibi bakmaktadır? Asha geçmişlerinin ne gibi sırlar barındırdığını merak eder.

description.de:
Die Jagd nach dem Ainu-Gold hat begonnen…

Wir schreiben das frühe 20. Jahrhundert, kurz nach dem russisch-japanischen Krieg. Hoch im verschneiten Norden Japans schlägt sich ein einzelner Mann durch die Wildnis. Sein Name: Sugimoto, der Unsterbliche. Geplagt von den Erinnerungen an den Krieg versucht er, sein mageres Einkommen durch Goldschürferei aufzubessern – ohne Erfolg.

Aber dann erfährt er von einem riesigen Goldschatz, der einst den Ainu gestohlen wurde. Der einzige Hinweis: eine Schatzkarte, eintätowiert auf die Rücken zahlreicher Gefängnisinsassen, die sich nun auf der Flucht befinden. Gemeinsam mit dem Ainu-Mädchen Asirpa bricht Sugimoto auf die tödlichste Schatzsuche der Geschichte auf. Denn wer dieses Gold jagt, ist bereit, über Leichen zu gehen…

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.en:
In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi “Immortal” Sugimoto scratches out a meager existence during the postwar gold rush in the wilderness of Hokkaido. When he stumbles across a map to a fortune in hidden Ainu gold, he sets off on a treacherous quest to find it. But Sugimoto is not the only interested party, and everyone who knows about the gold will kill to possess it! Faced with the harsh conditions of the northern wilderness, ruthless criminals and rogue Japanese soldiers, Sugimoto will need all his skills and luck—and the help of an Ainu girl named Asirpa - to survive.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
description.es:
Año 37 de la era Meiji. Tras sobrevivir a la guerra Ruso-Japonesa, Sugimoto, apodado “el Inmortal”, se une a la fiebre del oro para ayudar a la viuda de uno de sus amigos caído durante el conflicto. En su búsqueda, alguien le revela que existe un tesoro escondido y que las distintas claves para encontrarlo las llevan tatuadas en sus espaldas peligrosos convictos prófugos. En su camino se topará con Asirpa, quien no solo le salva la vida, sino que además le ayudará a sobrevivir en la dura tundra salvaje. ¡La carrera por hacerse con el tesoro ha comenzado!

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.fr:
Saichi Sugimoto est une véritable légende de la guerre russo-japonaise du début du XXe siècle. Surnommé «l'Immortel,» il a survécu aux pires batailles menées dans les régions les plus sauvages qui soient. Mais quand le conflit se termine, il se retrouve seul et sans le sou… C'est alors qu'il apprend l'existence d'un fabuleux trésor de 75 kilos d'or accumulé par les Aïnous, peuple autochtone vivant en harmonie avec la nature. Hélas, le magot a été volé, puis caché par un homme désormais enfermé dans la pire prison d'Hokkaido. Les seuls indices menant au butin sont de mystérieux tatouages inscrits sur la peau de criminels évadés…

Pour Sugimoto, la chasse au trésor est lancée… Cependant, seul, il a peu de chances de s'en sortir. À peine sa quête commence-t-elle qu’il manque de se faire déchiqueter par un ours brun! Il ne doit la vie qu'à l'intervention providentielle d'Ashirpa, jeune indigène liée aux propriétaires légitimes du butin. Ils décident de faire équipe pour affronter les nombreux dangers qui les guettent sur la route de l'or des Aïnous…

Maintes fois primé au Japon, *Golden Kamui* est un formidable mélange d'aventure en milieu hostile et de découverte culturelle, le tout porté par une intrigue aux rebondissements multiples. Laissez-vous entraîner dans cette quête épique à travers les immensités sauvages d'Hokkaido!

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Traduction française officielle](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.it:
Nel pieno dell’Era Meiji Saichi Sugimoto, ex soldato d’élite sopravvissuto a una delle battaglie più sanguinose della guerra Russo-Giapponese, lasciato l’esercito ha ormai un solo obiettivo: la corsa all’oro. È questa a portarlo in Hokkaido, l’estremo nord del Giappone abitato dal misterioso popolo degli Ainu e dove secondo una leggenda qualcuno ha nascosto una enorme quantità del prezioso metallo giallo… ma Sugimoto non è l’unico a seguire le tracce che portano al tesoro nascosto e per trovarlo dovrà affrontare spietate bande di criminali, l’esercito e il clima proibitivo dell’Hokkaido con l’aiuto di una giovane e decisa Ainu in cerca di vendetta.

---
In Hokkaido, la regione più a nord del Giappone, Sugimoto è sopravvissuto alla guerra russo-giapponese dell'epoca Meiji. Soprannominato durante la guerra "l'invincibile Sugimoto", adesso inizia la sua corsa all'oro alla ricerca delle ricchezze che gli permetteranno di salvare la moglie di un suo commilitone morto durante la guerra. Durante la ricerca s'imbatte in alcuni indizi che lasciano presagire l'esistenza una riserva d'oro gestita da criminali corrotti. Accompagnato da una ragazza Ainu che ha salvato la sua vita messa alla prova dal terribile clima del nord, i due iniziano la loro avventura contro i criminali.

---

- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.

description.ja:
『不死身の杉元』日露戦争での鬼神の如き武功から、そう謳われた兵士は、ある目的の為に大金を欲し、かつてゴールドラッシュに沸いた北海道へ足を踏み入れる。そこにはアイヌが隠した莫大な埋蔵金への手掛かりが!?　立ち塞がる圧倒的な大自然と凶悪な死刑囚。そして、アイヌの少女、エゾ狼との出逢い。『黄金を巡る生存競争』開幕ッ!!!!

---

description.pt:
Após feitos dignos de um guerreiro na Guerra Russo-Japonesa, o soldado conhecido como “Sugimoto, o imortal” vai para Hokkaido, onde houve a corrida do ouro, em busca de uma grande quantia de dinheiro para realizar certo objetivo. Ali, encontra pistas que levam a um grande tesouro escondido pelos ainus, mas ele precisa enfrentar também a natureza selvagem opressiva e prisioneiros violentos, assim como conhece uma garota ainu e um raro lobo-de-hokkaido. Tem início a luta pela sobrevivência em busca do ouro!!!

---

- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.

description.ru:
На Хоккайдо, далеко, в северных землях Японии, живёт Сугимото, переживший русско-японскую войну, и прозванный на ней Бессмертный Сугимото. Теперь он ищет богатства, обещанные золотой лихорадкой, в надежде спасти овдовевшую жену своего покойного товарища. Во время своей охоты на золото, он находит намеки на скрытый золотой склад преступников. Вместе с девушкой айну, которая некогда спасла его, они отважились на смертельное приключение против преступников, в поисках золотого тайника.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---

description.tr:
Sugimoto, Meiji Dönemi'nde, Japonya'nın kuzeyindeki Hokkaido'da meydana gelen Rus-Japon Savaşından sağ olarak kurtulur. Savaş boyunca "Ölümsüz Sugimoto" olarak anılan bu adam, şimdilerde savaşta ölen arkadaşının karısını kurtarma ümidi ile altınla gelen vaat edilmiş zenginliğin peşine düşer. Bu altın avcılığı süresince, yozlaşmış suçluların sakladığı altın gömüsüyle alakalı ipuçları bulur. Kötü iklim şartlarında hayatını kurtaran Auni'li bir kızla ortak olarak, altını arayan amansız suçlulara karşı ölüm-kalım mücadelesine girerler.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.

description.uk:
Далеко, на північних землях Хоккайдо, ветеран російсько-японської війни, за прізвиськом Суґімото "Безмертний", вирушив на пошуки багатств, обіцяні золотою лихоманкою. Загиблий товариш благав попіклуватись Сайчі про його хвору дружину, що терміново потребує гроші на лікування. Під час свого чергового невдалого полювання на золото, старий п'яниця розбовтує колишньому солдату про таємничий скарб айну, який викрав та сховав невідомий злодій. Натрапивши на слід "Безсмертний" Суґімото Сайчі розпочинає смертельну гонку з дівчинкою айну, на ім’я Асірпа.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

description.vi:
Tại Hokkaido, hòn đảo xa miền cực bắc của nhật bản, nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Sugimoto Saichi trở về từ cuộc chiến tranh Nga Nhật thời kì Minh Trị. Với biệt danh "Sugimoto Bất Tử" trong chiến tranh, anh lao vào chạy theo cơn sốt vàng nhằm thực hiện ý nguyện của người bạn thân đã mất trong trận chiến

---
[Traduction française officielle](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.pt-br: Em Hokkaido, nas terras do extremo norte do Japão, Sugimoto sobreviveu à guerra russo-japonesa da era Meiji. Apelidado de "Sugimoto, o Imortal" durante a guerra, ele agora procura as riquezas prometidas pela corrida do ouro, na esperança de salvar a esposa viúva de seu falecido companheiro da guerra. Durante a sua caça ao ouro, ele descobre sobre um estoque enorme de ouro escondido por um criminoso. Através de uma parceria com uma garota da tribo Ainu, que salva a sua vida, ele luta contra os criminosos, os militares, e a própria natureza para encontrar o tesouro!
description.zh-hk:
被稱為『不死身的杉元』、在日俄戰爭中有如鬼神般的殺敵， 被世人如此熟知的杉元佐一， 為了得到大量的黃金，來到了昔日淘金熱潮盛行的北海道。 於某次機遇下，他得知了隱藏著愛奴人龐大財寶的線索!? 在充滿威嚴的大自然中， 和許多兇惡的死刑犯、以及愛奴少女相遇， 『尋找黃金的生存競爭』正式開幕!!!

---

altTitles.th: จริง ๆ แล้ว โอบารัมน่ะ…

description.en: Rumor has it that Baram Oh had an affair with her married art school professor. It’s been four years since that debacle, and now she’s back at campus to try and enjoy her college life. But she’s not the only thing who’s returned: there’s rumors of a water ghost roaming the halls, and it just might be following her around.
description.id:
Oh Baram adalah seorang mahasiswi seni yang selalu dikelilingi oleh gosip yang tidak enak. Selingkuhan, gila, dan hanya ingin mendapatkan nilai A+. Setelah insiden yang membuat dia harus cuti, akhirnya dia kembali lagi ke kampus... sebagai mahasiswi cuti. Kira-kira apa yang akan terjadi di kehidupan kampusnya?

---

description.ko:
4년 전 학교를 떠들썩하게 만들었던 불륜녀 오바람이 복학했다.
그런데 복학한 것은 바람만이 아니다? 바람의 주변을 맴돈다는 물귀신 소문..!
바람은 물귀신의 훼방에도 굴하지 않고 즐거운 학교생활을 이어갈 수 있을까?
<라일락 200%> 아니영 작가의 캠퍼스 로맨스 신작!
description.th:
มีข่าวลือหนาหูว่า 'โอบารัม' ไปเป็นชู้กับอาจารย์สอนศิลปะที่มีครอบครัวแล้ว สี่ปีหลังจากที่เรื่องนี้แพร่ออกไป เธอก็ได้ยื่นเรื่องกลับมาเรียนใหม่และพยายามใช้ชีวิตในมหาวิทยาลัยอย่างมีความสุข แต่ทว่าไม่ใช่แค่เธอเท่านั้นที่ได้กลับมา ตอนนี้มีข่าวลือแพร่ไปทั่วว่า มีผีพรายสุดสยองตามโอบารัมกลับมาด้วย

description.zh:
被绯闻充斥的生活！
孤立无援的四次元少女！
传闻中害得教授家破人亡的学姐吴潇姗，在休学四年后重返校园。本以为一切会随着时间流逝而有所改变，但是负面消息依旧给吴潇姗带来了不少麻烦。自从复学以后，吴潇姗身边总是发生一些怪事。四年前的那场意外，以及现在发生的一切，真相到底是什么？ 

---
**Links:**

description.zh-hk:
傳聞中曾是已婚教授的小三、甚至搞得教授家破人亡的爭議學姊吳筱珊，好不容易休學四年後重返校園，以為一切流言蜚語會恢復平靜，殊不知糟糕的負面形象仍在校園四處興起、沸沸揚揚！且自從筱珊復學後，身邊總有怪事接二連三的發生，四年前的那場意外，難道另有隱情…?——《紫丁香200%》作家全新愛情懸疑新作！

altTitles.es-la: El oso de peluche del Duque

description.en:
She is an illegitimate child of a count and is always careful not to tarnish her family's name. Since childhood, she has a secret that no one knows, and that is everytime she goes to sleep, her soul leaves her body and wanders around ─ she can control and enjoy this ability of hers. One night at the ball, she got involved into an unpleasant situation with the Duke, and as she wanders around that night, she was accidentally sucked into a teddy bear which the Duke owned...

---

description.fr:
Marshall Radiance, une jeune fille noble, connaît un grave accident en étant enfant. Or, cet accident s'avère être une chance pour elle car depuis, elle est capable de détacher son âme de son corps et de posséder différents êtres. Cependant, son pouvoir est soumis à certaines contraintes et elle ne l'utilise que comme un passe-temps nocturne. Un jour, invitée au palais impérial pour une fête, Marshall entreprend sa balade nocturne habituelle mais tout se tourne mal lorsque son âme se fait capturer par un objet étrange: Un ours en peluche! Dans la panique elle apprend une autre nouvelle encore plus effrayante... le propriétaire de la peluche est le Duc Ludvillian, prénommé «le Mur de Glace.» Parviendra-t-elle à survivre dans le corps d'une peluche et d'échapper au soupçon du Duc?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/td12), [Bookcube](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=220143), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8123), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59209723), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/dukes_teddy_bear), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000052175), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8380974), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/7335)

description.id:
Marshall yang pernah jatuh saat kecil, memiliki kemampuan di mana jiwanya bisa berkeliling saat dia tidur. Dia juga bisa merasuki manusia dan hewan. Tapi suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba terjebak dalam boneka teddy bear, dan pemiliknya adalah Duke yang sedingin es?!

---
Marshall, anak haram Count. Agar tidak mencoreng nama keluarga bergengsi, dia memiliki rahasia yang tidak bisa dia ceritakan. Artinya, jika Anda tidur, jiwa meninggalkan tubuh! Marshall menikmati fenomena aneh ini secara positif setelah kecelakaan yang dideritanya sebagai seorang anak, dan selanjutnya memperoleh kemampuan untuk memiliki. Kemudian, suatu hari, di sebuah pesta untuk memperingati gencatan senjata di Istana Kekaisaran, dia terlibat dalam situasi yang tidak menyenangkan dengan panglima militer, Duke Ludvillian, yang disebut 'Ice of the Empire'...

---

description.uk:
Вона - незаконнонароджена дитина графа і завжди намагається не заплямувати ім'я своєї сім'ї. З дитинства вона має секрет, який ніхто не знає, і це щоразу, коли вона лягає спати, її душа залишає тіло і блукає навколо - вона може контролювати і насолоджуватися своєю здатністю. Якось увечері на балу вона потрапила в неприємну ситуацію з герцогом, і коли вона бродила тієї ночі, її випадково засмоктало в плюшевого ведмедика, який належав герцогу.

description.zh-hk:
伯爵的私生子馬歇爾。

為了不給名門的名聲抹黑，忍氣吞聲生活的她，有個不能說的秘密。

就是只要一睡覺靈魂就會脫離身體！

馬歇爾積極享受童年經歷的事故後發生的這一奇特現象，連年齡附身的能力都掌握在手。

有一天，她不得已出席了皇宮停戰紀念派對，與被稱為"帝國的冰牆"的軍隊總司令魯德維利安公爵發生了不愉快的情況...

description.en:
Sojiro, employed at a confectionery company, and his wife, Makoto, have joyfully opened their home to a foster child, Kuriko. But there's a catch – Kuriko seems to communicate mostly with a simple "mhm," perhaps due to nerves.

Sojiro, who has vague memories of his own early childhood, struggles to bridge the gap between him and Kuriko. However, Kuriko harbors a deep fascination with Sojiro's special talent – crafting delectable sweets! The art of confectionery becomes the thread that weaves this family closer together.

Join this heartwarming journey of a seemingly disconnected parent and child as they evolve into a bonded "family".
description.ja:
お菓子メーカーで働く長束総二郎とその妻・真琴は、4歳の少女・くり子を里子として迎える。幼い頃の記憶があまりない総二郎は、くり子との接し方に悩み、なかなか距離を縮めらずにいた。しかし、総二郎の得意なお菓子作りにくり子は興味津々！！

おいしい手作りお菓子で血のつながりのない親子が“家族”になっていくハートフルストーリー。

description.en: The story centers around Anjie, an electric doll, and Erio, a human raised by her. In order for Erio to experience the outside world, the two set out on a journey.

title.en: A Game That “Lets People Undo Moments They Regret”

altTitles.ja: 後悔をやり直せるゲーム

description.en: The terror man and the revival man finally meet. "Destruction is the beginning of resurrection". The whole world is in danger with the birth of a new evil. Min Jung-woo has the ability to see misfortune and Seok-hwan has the ability to come back to life. The two heroes made different choices…Who will be the final victor?

altTitles.ja-ro: Toaru Majutsu no Index Gaiden: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun

altTitles.es: Un cierto cañón de riel científico

altTitles.th: เรลกัน แฟ้มลับคดีวิทยาศาสตร์

altTitles.ja: とある科学の超電磁砲
とある魔術の禁書目録外伝 とある科学の超電磁砲

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

Is my cursed husband's fate up to me?
Madelyn's husband Ian was left broken after the war, and in turn, made her life a living hell. Fleeing her doomed marriage, she meets a tragic end. But when she opens her eyes, she finds herself at 17 again. The war has yet to start, and Madelyn can still change her fate. But what about Ian?
description.pt-br:
O destino do meu maldito marido depende de mim?
O marido de Madelyn, Ian, ficou destroçado depois da guerra e, por sua vez, tornou a vida dela um inferno. Fugindo de seu casamento condenado, ela encontra um fim trágico. Mas quando ela abre os olhos, ela se vê novamente com 17 anos. A guerra ainda não começou e Madelyn ainda pode mudar o seu destino. Mas e Ian?

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

altTitles.zh-hk: 想盡情享受的常客小姐

altTitles.zh: 想尽情享受的常客小姐

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

title.en: The Obsessive Second Male Lead Has Gone Wild

altTitles.es: El Segundo Protagonista Obsesivo Se Ha Vuelto Loco

altTitles.es-la: El Obsesivo Segundo Protagonista se ha Vuelto Loco

description.en:
I remember the story of a novel I had read in my previous life just before my marriage. If you don’t mess up the wedding, you’ll be poisoned by your husband! So I just kissed the priest who was in charge of the ceremony.

"Commander, are you alright?" 
One of the holy knights shouted as he approached the priest who was kissed. Huh, what? Wait... are you the commander of the Holy Knights?

**

Rurutia, who was about to die, wanted to spend her last moment in a temple where she felt at ease the most. She started a business with her friends for the temple, and itwas a big hit.

"Miss, you have the world in the palm of your hands!"

"Are you a God who descended to earth?"

In the midst of being embarrassed by the large crown, the commander of the holy knights himself was also acting strange.

“All I wish for is to be your husband,” he said that with eyes shining with obsession, "Take responsibility for stealing my first kiss."

This is all so wrong. It seems that I changed my future.
description.es: ‘Lurutier’, la hija de la familia Brucke en el Imperio de Oriente. Un día, Lurutier, quien fue abusada por su padre como víctima de un experimento mágico para resucitar a su madre muerta, aprende sobre el futuro en la encrucijada de la vida y la muerte. “¡No puedo morir así!” Para cambiar el futuro de ser vendida a un viejo conde y morir, Lurutier besa la cabeza de los Caballeros Sagrados, Cainzel, quien oficia en el salón de bodas.
description.fr:
Je me souviens de l'histoire d'un roman que j'avais lu dans ma vie précédente, juste avant mon mariage. Si tu ne gâches pas le mariage, tu seras empoisonnée par ton mari! Alors j'ai embrassé le prêtre qui était chargé de la cérémonie.

«Commandant, vous allez bien?» cria l'un des chevaliers sacrés en s'approchant du prêtre que je venais d'embrasser. Hein, comment? Attendez… vous êtes le commandant des chevaliers sacrés? Rurutia, qui était sur le point de mourir, voulait passer ses derniers moments dans un temple où elle se sentait en toute tranquillité. Avec ses amis, elle a monté une affaire pour le temple, et c'était un grand succès.

«Mademoiselle, vous avez le monde dans la paume de vos mains!»

«Êtes-vous un Dieu descendu sur terre?»

Au milieu de la gêne occasionnée par la grande couronne, le commandant des chevaliers sacrés lui-même se comportait étrangement.

«Tout ce que je souhaite, c'est d'être ton mari,» dit-il avec des yeux brillants d'obsession, «Assumes la responsabilité d'avoir volé mon premier baiser.»

Tout cela semble tellement faux. On dirait que j'ai changé mon avenir.

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.en: The Kyosha and Jinma clans are ninja organizations living in the modern age. They were called "super ninja," or "super shinobi." However, these two clans have been fighting a fierce battle to exterminate each other. Why? The unique tag team of Tetsu Kariya and Kazuhiko Shimamoto unleash a painful work!

title.en: He's Not Just a Pretty Face

altTitles.es-la: Él no es solo una cara bonita

description.en: Frede, the most handsome bachelor of the empire is marrying Ayla, the only daughter of the powerful duke and a notoriously selfish woman. As much as he is unwilling, Frede is caught off guard when Ayla, who had been swooning over him, offers a deal to end the marriage after one year. Confused with her change in heart and softened attitude, Frede now struggles with a growing urge to stop the fated divorce.

title.en: Aisare Tenshi na Classmate ga, Ore ni Dake Itazura ni Hohoemu

altTitles.ja: 愛され天使なクラスメイトが、俺にだけいたずらに微笑む

altTitles.en: The Classmate Who Is Adored by Everyone Smiles Teasingly Only at Me

description.en:
Girls and sweets are full of secrets!? 

Ichise Souma is a high school student who dreams of becoming a pastry chef and devotes himself to making sweets. He meets Satomi Chika, a female classmate, after receiving some sweets. 

Chika is a beautiful girl with a soothing personality, known at school as the “Angel of Peace.” Souma thought she was a good girl who would kindly listen to his worries about making sweets, but... 

"Ichise-san, your embarrassed face is really cute." 

Chika shows an unexpected side of herself only when they are alone, and Souma’s heart is on the verge of exploding! A sweet and stimulating boy-meets-girl story with a mischievous angel connected by sweets begins!

altTitles.en: Good Shoes Take You Good Places.
Wherever Your Shoes Take You, Good Shoes Take You Good Places.

description.en: "Good shoes will take you to a good place" - these are the words of Yusai Ayumi, who took over the workshop with her late mother, a shoemaker, in her heart. Yusai's shoes, which she makes while casting a spell for the wearer to go to a good place, gently wrap someone's first step today. A story of a shoemaker who is still inexperienced, but still warm.

[Younger Top x Older Bottom | Mafia | Power Struggle] Late 19th Century, Paris, France. Vincent, a third-rate painter, accidentally witnesses a crime scene and, in order to survive, is forced to work at a gallery run by Roland, a mafia with ulterior motives. However, the seemingly fragile painter has a hidden identity. As they search for a stolen antique sketch, the situation between the underworld and the law spirals out of control. In the furnace of fame, fortune, and desire, who will ultimately tame whom? Watch as the weak painter turns the tables in Paris's underground world! Cold Younger Mafia x Cunning Older Painter

title.en: Kirawaremono no Akuyaku Reisoku ni Tensei shita no ni, Naze ka Mawari ga Hanatte Oite Kurenai

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ者の悪役令息に転生したのに、なぜか周りが放っておいてくれない

altTitles.en: I’ve Been Reborn as a Hated Villain, but for Some Reason People Around Me Won’t Leave Me Alone

description.en:
A modern Japanese office worker suddenly dies and finds himself reincarnated into a game world... as the ugly, pushover son of a villain, Klaus Muller! 

Realizing that if he plays out the game as it is in the original, he will be condemned and executed by the hero, he begins to take action to avoid the catastrophic ending. Klaus puts in a lot of effort and gains the trust of those around him, including the heroine and his family. In the midst of all this, he unintentionally makes a big impact and attracts attention…!? 

The grand opening of a fantasy about a scumbag’s big comeback!

‘Jung Hae-il’, a police officer, returns to his hometown in Seoul from Daegu to escape the guilt of his past. However, he unexpectedly runs into his old lover, ‘Jun Seon’, who is involved with a new drug related to his past trauma. As Hae-il faces this new challenge, a mysterious new assistant, ‘Han Gyeol’, appears before him…

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

description.en:
A series of different yandere images by the artist @RinRin200001.

---

**Links:**
- Retail Site - [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/maniax-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ420882.html) (Includes Chapter 1-50)

**Notes:**
- From Chapter 134 the author has been publishing a "DereDere version" of the comic on their [FANBOX](https://rinrin83.fanbox.cc/)

Garyou Hanagami is a veteran mangaka. Best known for the behemoth of a series that is Dragon Land, Hanagami-sensei has years of experience under his belt and is always thinking up new manga ideas. 

Shinobu Miyama is not. An amateur working for Hanagami-sensei as an assistant, Miyama is nicknamed “The Chameleon” for his ability to copy the artstyles of those he works under. However, his true dream is to escape the faceless crowds and become someone. 

So what happens when a work accident causes them to swap bodies?
description.fr:
Garyou Hanagami est un mangaka chevronné. Il est connu pour son oeuvre Dragon Land, le manga le plus populaire. Hanagami a des années d'expérience à son actif et déborde d'une créativité et d'une énergie folle.

Shinobu Miyama est un dessinateur travaillant pour Hanagami en tant qu'assistant libre. Miyama est surnommé "le caméléon" en raison de sa capacité à copier le style de n'importe quel artiste à la perfection. Cependant, son véritable rêve est de sortir de la masse et de devenir quelqu'un avec une grande renommée.

Suite a un accident, les deux mangaka échangent de corps. Garyou va maintenant devoir battre sa propre oeuvre, dans le corps d'un illustre inconnu.
Une bataille au sommet du manga commence ! 
Entre le dragon qui repart de zéro et le caméléon qui tente d'imiter cet animal céleste ! 

Qui va remporter le titre du meilleur mangaka ?!

description.en:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mymmx89)

**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

altTitles.es: Una habitación del color de la felicidad

altTitles.th: หนึ่งห้องแห่งความสุข

description.cs:
Jednoho dne dojde k únosu mladé dívky.
Pro ni je to ale nový začátek, poprvé začne doufat ve šťastný život. Ona mu slíbí, že si ho vezme. On se jí za to snaží do života vnést co nejvíc šťastných chvil.
Jedná se o únosce a jeho oběť… Tak proč k sobě mají tak blízko?
description.de: Sachi kommt mit ihren Eltern nicht klar und will einfach nur weg. Deshalb täuscht sie gemeinsam mit dem Typen, der sie immer stalkt, eine Entführung vor. Versteckt in dessen Einzimmer-Appartment machen die beiden einen Deal: Wenn sie mit der Entführungsnummer durchkommen, wird geheiratet...
description.en:
One day, a fourteen year-old girl was kidnapped… or so the police have been lead to believe. Actually, she tried to run away from her abusive parents and was helped by her stalker who then shelters her in his apartment. Although he considers his actions as kidnapping, the girl is happy about the situation and proposes to him, with the condition that if they are caught, they will commit suicide.

---
One day, a girl was kidnapped. However, that girl started to desire a life living with her captor, and swears that she will marry him. In return, her captor provides her with happiness that she had always longed for. How could a story between a girl and her captor be so heart warming?
description.es: Tras ser secuestrada, una chica desgraciada es feliz por primera vez. El día que la secuestran empieza una vida con un hilo de esperanza. Ella le promete a su secuestrador que se casarán y él le ofrece felicidad. ¿Cómo pueden tener una relación tan cálida siendo un secuestrador y su víctima?
description.id:
"Kalau berhasil lolos, kita akan menikah. Kalau tertangkap, kita mati bersama..."

Begitulah janji yang dilontarkan Sachi pada pemuda yang baru saja menculiknya. Dia yang tak punya tempat di manapun di dunia ini, merasa menemukan kebahagiaan di sisi penculiknya...
description.it:
Un giorno una ragazza di quattordici anni viene rapita. O almeno è quello che la polizia crede. In realtà la ragazza ha provato a fuggire dai violenti genitori e ha trovato rifugio… dal suo stalker, che ora la ospita nel suo appartamento.

Per quanto lui continui a pensare di aver commesso un rapimento, la ragazza è felice di quello che è successo e si dichiara a lui, promettendo che, in caso di cattura, si toglieranno la vita insieme.
description.ja:
薄幸な少女は誘拐されて“幸せ"を初めて知る。

その日、少女は誘拐された。
しかし、それは少女にとって一縷の希望にかけた生活の始まりだった。
少女は誘拐犯に結婚を誓い、誘拐犯は少女にたくさんの“幸せ"を捧ぐ。
被害者と誘拐犯の関係なのに―――どうしてこんなに温かいの?
pixiv&Twitterの超話題作が待望の書籍化!!!
半分以上が本書限定の描き下ろしエピソードを収録!!!
description.pl: W mediach zawrzało. Wieść o zaginionej nastolatce rozniosła się w mgnieniu oka. Policja nie wyklucza porwania. Nikt nie przypuszcza, że płaczący przed kamerą rodzice, od lat znęcali się nad córką. Nie mogąc dłużej tego znieść dziewczyna uciekła z domu i znalazła schronienie pod dachem tajemniczego młodego mężczyzny. Ściany pokoju, w którym teraz mieszka zdobi mozaika zdjęć zrobionych jej z ukrycia. Wybawcą nastolatki jest bowiem jej własny stalker. Choć dziewczyna przebywa z nim dobrowolnie i może odejść w każdej chwili, obydwoje zdają sobie sprawę, że jeśli ktoś pozna ich sekret, mężczyzna natychmiast zostanie skazany za porwanie. Nastolatka proponuje więc swojemu wybawcy niezwykły układ - jeśli zdołają ukryć się do czasu, gdy uzyska pełnoletniość, wezmą ślub. Jeśli złapie ich policja - obydwoje popełnią samobójstwo. Jaki będzie finał tej dramatycznej historii?
description.vi: Một cô gái 14 tuổi bị bắt cóc, nhưng lạ thay, cô không hề kháng cự, tthay vào đó, cô hứa sẽ kết hôn với chính kẻ đã bắt cóc mình, đổi lại anh phải che trở cho cô, đem lại hạnh phúc cho cô - thứ cô chưa từng được biết đến suốt 14 năm xuân xanh của mình. Một câu chuyện cảm động nói về 2 con người- 2 số phận bi đát tìm được nhau, liệu họ có trốn thoát khỏi những kẻ đang săn đuổi mình, liệu hạnh phúc có đến với 2 số phận bi đát kia không...? Chúng ta hãy chờ xem.

description.en: Da-yeon was excited by the news of legalization of same-sex marriage. I filed a marriage registration with a woman I didn't know because I was drunk....!?
description.ko:
「 레진챌린지에서 독자들의 정신이 아찔해지게 웃기고 설렜던 선 결혼 후 연애 로맨스!! 」
동성혼 합법화 소식에 들떠 번개에 나간 모쏠 레즈 이다연.
술에 취해 모르는 여자와 혼인신고를 해버렸다....!?

description.en: At first, Yona gave some major side-eye to the popular game "Concubine Walkthrough" until she got sucked into it—literally! Now stuck as the villain, she has her hands full facing the infamously cruel emperor, shaking off scheming concubines, and befriending NPCs. There’s only one way the Game Master will let her out and that’s to become the Empress! Will she be able to stay true to her honest and straightforward self despite the palace’s intrigues? One extra problem: she’s got competition...
description.es: ¿Estás atrapado en el juego de realidad virtual <Concubine Attack>? ¡La única forma de volver a la realidad es ver el final de convertirse en emperatriz!

altTitles.ja: 咲ちゃんは淫魔の子（合掌）

description.en:
Saki-chan, a succubus, has fallen in love with Rokuhara, a son of a temple, of all people. She tries her best to talk to him, but her succubus blood runs wild and she always ends up tempting him. "I wish I could say I love you honestly!"

This is a story about a pure and simple love of a succubus who can't be honest.
description.ja: 「えっちだってだいじょうぶっ教!?」がSNSで大反響！ 待望の第1巻！ 淫魔の咲ちゃんが恋した相手は、よりにもよってお寺の息子の六原くん。頑張って話しかけようとしても淫魔の血が暴走して、ついつい誘惑してしまい――。「素直に好きと言えたらいいのに！」ぽんこつ可愛い淫魔のピュアピュアHな恋の行方は……!? 残念サキュバス×カタブツお寺男子の昇天上等、全力ラブコメ！

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri
Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại truyện: Nhật ký say tít mù của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en: Kikuri Hiroi (25 years old). She is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK", and she loves alcohol. She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment of the live house, so she seems to be short of money. She lives in a 52-year-old apartment without a bath, and sometimes borrows showers from her friends and acquaintances. She is regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, which she counters with a "happiness spiral" with the help of alcohol. What is her daily life like...?!

altTitles.ja: 天動のシンギュラリティ

description.en: Satoshi Hase, the writer who brought you technology, and worldviews such hIE and advanced artificial intelligence which appeared in BEATLESS, now takes his place as the World Design Editor in a brand new comic. Taking place in the floating city which was established as AHQ, Mega-float. What is the true nature of this "Magic" used in the near future…?
description.ru:
События развернутся в плавучем городе, созданном специально как зона AHQ района Мегафлот. Героям предстоит узнать, что же на самом деле такое эта «магия», используемая в ближайшем будущем...

---

(source: readmanga)

description.en: A girl in a maid uniform came to Hitoyoshi's house looking for a job. Her previous job was an assassin, and she is skilled in all the deadly arts, but she's a complete beginner at housework. Hitoyoshi was confused by the strange request and sent her away. But then she saved Hitoyoshi from a deadly accident, and he thought maybe they can make this work? This is a story about a maid who was a cold-hearted killer learning about new emotions. A maid who lived a lonely life in the underworld finally finding family. The start of an enjoyable daily life.
description.id: ||Seorang gadis dengan pakaian pelayan datang ke rumah Hitoyoshi untuk mencari pekerjaan. Pekerjaan dia sebelumnya adalah seorang pembunuh, dan dia sangat ahli dalam semua teknik membunuh, tapi dia sangat awam dalam pekerjaan rumah. Hitoyoshi bingung dengan permintaan anehnya itu dan memintanya pergi. Tapi kemudian gadis itu menyelamatkan Hitoyoshi dari sebuah kecelakaan maut, dan Hitoyoshi pikir dia mungkin bisa mempekerjakannya? Ini adalah kisah tentang seorang pelayan yang dulunya adalah pembunuh berdarah dingin kini belajar tentang emosi baru. Seorang pelayan yang hidup kesepian di dunia bawah akhirnya menemukan keluarga. Awal kehidupan sehari-hari yang menyenangkan dimulai!||

title.en: Multiverse no Watashi, Koishite Ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: マルチバースの私、恋していいですか?

altTitles.ja-ro: Maruchibāsu no Watashi, Koishite Ii desu ka?

altTitles.en: Is It Alright for My Multiverse Self to Fall in Love?
Can I Fall in Love with a Multiverse?

description.en:
If things had gone differently, we might never have met, you and I.

Would you have any regrets if you never said "I love you"?

Exploring endless possibilities in this multiverse rom-com one-shot!

When you wake up after hitting your head, your sex drive will be multiplied by 4000?!

Seigo Hasegawa, a man who has suddenly acquired a cheat sex drive, and his childhood friend An Yagami, who feels responsible for Seigo and tries to help him (sexually). The battle between Seigo and his sexual desire begins now... (MTL)
description.ru: Мозг - величайший «черный ящик» в теле человека. Например, мальчик, получивший мячом по голове, может вспомнить случайный опыт или вещь, которые он когда-либо видел, как если бы это была картинка. Или сотрудник компании, никогда не игравший на фортепиано, получивший сотрясение мозга и потерявший сознание, после пробуждения выдавал бесчисленные композиции. Есть еще множество неизученных участков мозга человека при стимулировании которых неизвестно, что произойдет… В этой истории Хасегава Сейго крепко ударился головой и повредил обе руки при спасении своей подруги, когда та упала со стремянки в библиотеке. Чувствуя свою ответственность за травмы лучшего друга, подруга решительно вызывается во всем помогать Сейго в его непростом состоянии.

description.en: The secret of the record left by my grandfather, the underground record shop dealing with forbidden pop music, and the old jukebox in the diner of the near future. A collection of short stories that traces the memories and feelings contained in the records.
description.ja: 祖父の遺したレコードの秘密、禁制のポップ音楽を扱う地下レコード店、近未来のダイナーにおかれた古びたジュークボックス。レコードに込められた記憶と想いを辿る短篇集。

title.en: Kantai Collection -KanColle- Shimakaze Tsumujikaze no Shoujo

altTitles.ja-ro: Kantai Collection - Kankore - Shimakaze Tsumujikaze no Shoujo

altTitles.en: Kantai Collection - Kankore - Shimakaze Whirlwind Girl

altTitles.ja: 艦隊これくしょん -艦これ- 島風 つむじ風の少女

description.en:
Part of the [Kantai Collection](https://mangadex.com/?page=search&title=Kantai%20Collection) franchise.  
  
The world is in a state of isolation. The cause is due to mysterious deep sea entities the navy has dubbed the "Deep Sea Fleet" and their taking over the seas isolating all the countries of the world from one another. Refusing to just sit idly by and let the Deep Sea Fleet have its way, all the countries of the world pool their resources to make a new weapon to combat them… a weapon that is comparable in power to that of a battleship… and it's name is: The Fleet Girls. Will this new weapon be enough to combat the Deep Sea Fleet? Will the ensign that was just sent to the naval base where the "Fleet Girls" are kept be able to aid in their struggle… Only time will tell as this war against the Deep Sea Fleet begins to unfold.

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

title.en: Tsuitenai Game Jikkyousha wa Akogare no Hito ni Kakinsareru

altTitles.ja: ツイてないゲーム実況者は憧れの人に課金される

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuitenai Game jikkyousha wa akogare no hito ni kakin sareru

description.en:
"Hasumi, a university student who meets with misfortune whenever she does anything, is interested in Oikawa, who helped her out at the entrance ceremony.
However, when she steels herself to talk to him, he doesn't even remember her... Then, at the suggestion of her older brother, who noticed how amusing Hasumi's game-playing was, she decides to livestream a let's play. The video unexpectedly goes viral, and Oikawa has found it too...?

Gaming livestreamer x unlaughing guy—who will be the one to get hooked?"

Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.

altTitles.en: The Princess Me of the Night

altTitles.vi: Là em, công chúa của màn đêm

description.en:
Shoto is a 20-year-old part-time worker struggling with his first love (rejected but still friends) with his high school best friend. Suddenly one day he was unemployed because the restaurant he worked part-time at went bankrupt, and at the same time he discovered there was something floating under his butt. He decided to go to a dermatologist for a check-up when he met Hizuki, a dermatologist - and after an appointment with this doctor, he discovered that the doctor was also in an unrequited love like him.

Both of them had unrequited love so they decided to stay together temporarily to "fill the void in their hearts, bodies and wallets" but gradually they developed feelings again.!?
description.vi:
Shoto là một nhân viên bán thời gian 20 tuổi đang phải vật lộn với mối tình đầu (bị từ chối nhưng vẫn làm bạn) với người bạn thân thời trung học. Bỗng dưng một ngày cậu bị thất nghiệp vì quán ăn cậu làm thêm phá sản, cùng lúc cậu phát hiện ra dưới mông mình có nổi gì đó. Cậu quyết định đi da liễu để khám thì cậu gặp Hizuki, một bác sĩ da liễu- và sau cuộc hẹn với vị bác sĩ này cậu phát hiện bác sĩ cũng đang có mối tình đơn phương như mình.

Cả 2 đều có mối tình đơn phương nên quyết định sẽ ở cạnh nhau tạm thời để “lấp đầy khoảng trống con tim, cơ thể và ví” nhưng dần dần họ lại nảy sinh tình cảm .!?

altTitles.ja: あくまであまい私の彼女

description.en:
Mai Amai --a girl who loves sweets-- got dumped by her girlfriend, and she's still grappling with the heartbreak. One day, the café she works at gets a new employee: The gorgeous Riri Kurosaki. Mai falls head over heels for her before realizing Riri is actually a succubus!

"I want to eat you and your parfaits right up! <3"
Thus starts a cute and trendy, but devilish, girls' romantic comedy!
description.ja: 甘いものが大好きな女の子・天井真衣は、付き合っていた彼女に振られて傷心中。ある日、勤務先のカフェの新人としてやってきた美少女・黒崎梨々に一目惚れをするも、なんと彼女は"サキュバス"という悪魔で……？パフェもあなたも食べちゃいたい♡ ポップでキュートな悪魔ティックガールズラブコメ、スタート！

description.en: The world is riddled with beasts and demons, however little do people know that a magical barrier is currently sealing away high-level demons. There are those who wish to break the barrier and bring about the end of the world, and those who wish to protect it and its inhabitants. A great battle with heroes, villains, demons and magic is about to begin and will determine the fate of the world.

description.en: In this world, there are two types of people. Those Who have powerful "skills", and those who don't. People born with powerful skills, exterminate monsters to level up and become successful, while people without them, become failures, who are treated harshly by society. Follow the story of Fate, a guy who works as a gatekeeper, and whose only skill is gluttony, a skill that only makes him hungry.
description.fr:
Dans ce monde, il y a deux types de personnes. Ceux qui ont un ou plusieurs "talents", et ceux qui n'en possèdent pas. Les personnes nées avec de puissant talents, exterminent les monstres pour monter en niveaux et devenir puissants, alors que ceux qui n'en possèdent pas deviennent des échecs et sont traités durement par la société. Nous suivons l'histoire de Fate, un homme travaillant comme garde aux portes de la ville et dont son seul talents est la gourmandise, un talent qui ne fait que lui donner faim.  


---
description.ro:
În lumea asta sunt două tipuri de oameni: cei care posedă “puteri” incredibile și cei care nu.  
Cei care au fost născuți cu asemenea “puteri” extermină monștrii, evoluează și devin oameni de success, în timp ce ceilalți devin eșecuri, și sunt tratați diferit de societate.  
Citește povestea lui Fate, un tip ce lucrează ca și gardian, a cărui putere este lăcomia, o putere care îl face să fie mereu înfometat.   
  


---

description.ru:
В этом мире есть два типа людей. Те, у кого есть сильные «навыки», и те, кто их не имеет. Люди, рожденные с мощными навыками, уничтожают монстров, чтобы стать успешными, в то время как люди без них становятся неудачниками, к которым жестоко относится общество. В нашей истории, парень, который работает в качестве привратника, и чье единственное умение — обжорство, умение, которое только делает его голодным.   
  


---
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, existem dois tipos de pessoas. Aqueles que têm poderosas “habilidades” e aqueles que não. As pessoas nascidas com habilidades poderosas exterminam monstros para subirem de nível e se tornarem bem-sucedidas, enquanto as pessoas sem eles, tornam-se fracassos, que são tratados com dureza pela sociedade. Fate é um cara que trabalha como um porteiro, e cuja única habilidade é a gula, uma habilidade que o faz comer almas.

description.en: Yonghak ultimately failed to save the world despite repeated regressions. At the next regression, he decides to quit being a savior. But suddenly, disciples show up, one by one... Will the world be kept safe?! Will the savior be able to fulfill his bucket list of wishes for rest?!
description.ko:
반복되는 회귀에도 결국 세상을 구원하지 못한 용학 
다음 회귀에 이르러 구원자를 그만두기로 한다. 
그런데 하나둘 제자가 생기고… 세상이 자꾸만 구원되기 시작한다?! 
과연 구원자는 쉬고 싶어 하는 자신의 버킷리스트를 이룰 수 있을까?

description.en:
Super serious and uptight high school student Koutaro Suzuki and his obnoxious gyaru kouhai Sorako Mozu get along like cats and dogs. She spends her days tormenting him, while he spends his days getting outraged by her. However, the two of them share a secret...that they're living together as fiancés!! Under the condition that Koutaro marry Sorako, who comes from a wealthy real estate family, they've agreed to buy his father's company and save it from going under!!

Having to deal with Sorako, who uses this and that (and you know what) to torment him, can Koutaro make her yield and successfully marry her?!

---

- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64744)
description.ja: クソ真面目で融通が利かない男子高校生・鈴紀光太郎は生意気な後輩ギャル・百舌そら子と犬猿の仲。そんな二人には秘密が…それは二人が許嫁関係で同棲していること!? 資産家の家族を持つそら子と結婚をする条件で、光太郎は潰れる寸前の父の会社を買収してもらっていたのだ!! あの手この手（エッ●なこと）で責めるメスガキそら子にたいし、光太郎は彼女を屈服させ、無事に結婚をすることができるのか――!!?

description.en:
"For 8 years, I wished for a morning like this."
First place in midterms, winner in the relay. For academic-and-sports genius Ao, this is the first time he's wanted something from the bottom of his heart.
And that was Midori, always second place, who saw himself as his rival.
He can't control his love for him, and when he sees Midori, he's so happy that he can't help but run up to him.
But, afraid to ruin their relationship, he carries the pain and longs for him late at night...
"I want the first thing I see when I wake up to be your eyelashes."
